channel.title: CVE Feed for Hector Cabrera -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-43468|2024-08-03T13:32:59.916Z -- hector%20cabrera -- wordpress%20popular%20posts
item.description: External initialization of trusted variables or data stores vulnerability exists in WordPress Popular Posts 6.0.5 and earlier, therefore the vulnerable product accepts untrusted external inputs to update certain internal variables. As a result, the number of views for an article may be manipulated through a crafted input.
